00061   class DaqTypeDataBlock : public LCGenericObjectImplExt {
00062     
00063

00065     
00067     DaqTypeDataBlock() {
00068       //Reset the maps which buffer the values
00069       _timeStampMapRaw.clear();
00070       _timeStampMap.clear();
00071       _bufferOfDbls.clear();
00072       _bufferOfInts.clear();
00073       _bufferOfFloats.clear();      
00074       
00075     };
00076     
00077     
00078     //Set Parameters of the board by which the data were taken  
00081     DaqTypeDataBlock(LCObject* obj, bool restoreMaps=true) : LCGenericObjectImplExt(obj) { 
00082       //Reset the maps which buffer the values
00083       if(restoreMaps) {
00084         _timeStampMapRaw.clear();
00085         _timeStampMap.clear();
00086         _bufferOfDbls.clear();
00087         _bufferOfInts.clear();
00088         _bufferOfFloats.clear();      
00089         RestoreMaps();
00090       }
00091     } 
00092 
00093

00098     {_timeStampMapRaw=timeStampMapRaw;
00099       return *this;}
